definitions.definition: The probability of a specified outcome; the chance of something happening; probability ; the state or degree of being probable .
examples: In all likelihood the meeting will be cancelled.
The likelihood is that the inflation rate will continue to rise.

definitions.definition: The probability that some fixed outcome was generated by a random distribution with a specific parameter .

main_definition: The probability of a specified outcome; the chance of something happening; probability ; the state or degree of being probable .
secondary_definitions: ( statistics , probability theory ) The probability that some fixed outcome was generated by a random distribution with a specific parameter .
